IEXStock General Class

A class that is built around retrieving data from the IEX Cloud API service. All available data is derived from functions defined in the stock.py module, and are implemented here with a get_ prefix. All data retrieved is automatically stored in the corrosponding class attribute (sans get_ prefix). Data set to class attributes can be saved to file and subsequently loaded from that file to limit credit usage in IEX Cloud.

param ticker

The symbol or ticker of the stock for which the class is to be created.

type ticker

string, required

param period

Default is ‘quarter’. Allows a user to set period data for all income statement requests.

type period

string, optional

param last

Default is 1. Allows a user to specify how many statements to retrieve of financial statement data.

type last

integer, optional

param autopopulate

Automatically populates key information as class attributes. Uses methods ‘basic_information’ and ‘price_information’

type autopopulate

boolean, optional
